titleStmt.title: A letter sent out of Ireland from the Right Honorable Earle of Ormond and Ossory, to his much honored uncle, Sr. Robert Poyntz shewing the true estate of the kingdome of Ireland at this present time, and delivered to his uncle here, the 21, of Iune, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Dublin the 10. of June 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
